name: BHUJBAL DAILY SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are preparing to launch a clean energy services program for Urban multi-tenant Buildings (MTBs) in metro cities, starting with Mumbai. The program will encompass providing (1) shared rides (mostly for short distance travel to metro, markets or other neighborhood hotspots) in AC electric cars to the residents and offices in MTBs, (2) setting up and operating EV charging service at such MTBs  and (3) powering all miles clocked by the shared electric cars and Electric Vehicles of residents with 100% clean energy generated from roof top solar, thus realizing an end to end distributed clean energy value chain and becoming a catalyst to fast track EV adoption.
name: SKYBLESS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Salesofly is a cloud tech company that aims to bridge the barriers between sales and technology to increase the productivity of fleet on street and the ROI for technology applications. Our value proposition is to use our expertise in the following pillars - Automation, Enablement, Readiness and Operations to solve customer issues pertaining to these areas and be a consultant to the customer in their transformation journey rather just selling a solution.
name: Salesofly
